qas.question: What is the largest cable company in the world by revenue?
What merged companies are the largest pay TV entity in the world?
Comcast is also the largest media company in the United States in what broadband area?
In what areas of the US does Comcast operate?

answers.text: 40 states and the District of Columbia

qas.question: What did Comcast Corporation change its name to?
How many states does AT&T serve?
What company merged with Comcast, making it the largest TV company?
What is the largest home internet provider in the world?

context: <a0_0><b9_0>Comcast Corporation<b9_0/><a0_0/>, formerly registered as <b5_0>Comcast Holdings<b5_0/>,[note 1] is an American multinational mass media company and is the largest broadcasting and largest cable company in the world by revenue. It is the second largest pay-TV company after the <a1_0>AT&T-<b8_0>DirecTV<b8_0/><a1_0/> acquisition, largest cable TV company and largest home <a2_0>Internet service provider<a2_0/> in the United States, and the nation's third largest home telephone service provider. Comcast services U.S. residential and commercial customers in <a3_0><b6_0>40<b6_0/> states and the District of Columbia<a3_0/>. The company's headquarters are located in <a4_0><b7_0>Philadelphia, Pennsylvania<b7_0/><a4_0/>.
